recipe.title: Sauteed Chayote with Garlic and Herbs
ingredients: 2 large chayote squash, peeled, halved lengthwise, pitted, thinly sliced
instructions: Melt butter in heavy large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chayote, 1 tablespoon parsley, and garlic. Sauté until chayote is crisp-tender, about 3 minutes. Stir in green onions. Transfer to bowl; sprinkle with 1 tablespoon parsley.
